t: Lenovo vs. IBM: Anticipating Stronger Business Simulations

t: ​Lenovo bought IBM's PC business 10 years ago: Jury out on broader ambitions | ZDNET
s: April 30, 2015 - The IBM-Lenovo deal in 2005 will go down as a win-win scenario. Lenovo bought IBM's PC business and an iconic ThinkPad brand and leveraged it to be the No. 1 PC maker. By shedding the PC business, IBM transformed into a hardware, software and services outfit.
